alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:25PM CDT until April 15 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 425 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Laurel Hill to near Crestview to Wright to 15 miles south of Navarre Beach, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Vernon, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Chipley, Hartford, Slocomb, Samson, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Freeport, Paxton and Ponce De Leon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across the western Florida Panhandle. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
